price: Ногузир онон дар охират аз ҳама зиёнкортаранд
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
